Barronite rock is a rock found in the Ruins of Camdozaal, when mined they give barronite shards and have a small chance of giving a barronite deposit.

Contents

  • 1 Mining Info
    • 1.1 Pre roll drops
    • 1.2 Main drops
    • 1.3 Conditional drops
  • 2 Changes
  • 3 References

Mining Info[edit | edit source]

Barronite rock
Level required 14
Barronite shards XP16 xp
Barronite deposit XP32 xp
Depletion time20 seconds
Required toolPickaxe
Respawn time1 minute

Pre roll drops[edit | edit source]

A gem table rolls before the main drop table.[1] There's a chance to receive nothing here so that players can receive no items from a rock even if they are guaranteed to receive an ore in the main drop table.[2] The table gets more likely to be rolled if the player has a amulet of glory equipped: the probability grows from 1/256 to 1/86.[3]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
NothingN/A70/32,768; 70/11,008[d 1]N/AN/A
Uncut sapphire132/32,768; 32/11,008[d 1]36315
Uncut emerald116/32,768; 16/11,008[d 1]56230
Uncut ruby18/32,768; 8/11,008[d 1]1,19060
Uncut diamond12/32,768; 2/11,008[d 1]2,743120
  1. ↑ 1.0 1.1 1.2 1.3 1.4 The drop rate is increased while wearing an amulet of glory

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Barronite shards4–676/100Not sold0
Barronite deposit124/100Not sold0

The probability for a player to receive a barronite shards or a barronite deposit drop is shown for varying levels in the figure below.[4]

Conditional drops[edit | edit source]

The following table shows items which can additionally be received upon a successful resource roll. Also, the rock will deplete upon a successful resource roll.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Clue geode (beginner)1RareNot soldN/A
Clue geode (easy)1RareNot soldN/A
Clue geode (medium)1RareNot soldN/A
Clue geode (hard)1RareNot soldN/A
Clue geode (elite)1RareNot soldN/A
Rock golem1Very rareNot soldN/A

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 April 2021
(update) 		Hotfix
  • Mining experience gained from obtaining a Barronite deposit increased from 24 to 32.
  • Mining experience gained from obtaining Barronite shards increased from 12 to 16.
  • The chance of successfully mining Barronite at high Mining levels has been decreased, but the chance at low Mining levels has been increased.
  • The extra chance of success afforded by the Charm of Mining has been increased from 5% to 10%.
15 April 2021
(update) 		Hotfix
  • The base chance of getting a Barronite deposit increased from 3% to 24%.
  • Mining experience gained from obtaining a Barronite deposit reduced to 24 from 250.
  • Mining experience gained from obtaining Barronite shards reduced to 12 from 25.
  • The Charm of Mining now gives an extra 5% chance of success when mining, rather than 5% additional deposits.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 11 February 2020. (Archived from the original on 27 November 2020.) Mod Ash: "It adds a gem roll before each ore roll, and if you receive a gem you don't get the ore roll."
  2. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 6 July 2020. (Archived from the original on 27 November 2020.) Mod Ash: "Yes, [the mining gem table has] got [...] chance of giving no gem."
  3. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 7 Feb 2017. (Archived from the original on 18 Jun 2019.) Mod Ash: "[the actual increase when wearing the Amulet of Glory while mining is] 1/86 rather than 1/256 for a gem."
  4. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 28 August 2021. (Archived from the original on 10 October 2019.) Mod Ash: "Using the usual linear thing, I think it'd go from 31% at level 1 to 39% at level 99, though you may have unlocked a buff to help."
